description: A vast throng of lemmings, appearing joyful and enthusiastic, runs downhill towards a beach in the distance. In the foreground, one lemming sits placidly in a hole, observing the departing crowd. The scene presents an absurd inversion of the typical lemming behavior, portraying a mass movement towards a leisure destination rather than a fatal plunge. This highlights the irony of herd mentality applied to a mundane activity and questions the desirability of conformity.
caption: “C’mon! You’ll miss the fun! ... All the lemmings are going down to the beach!”
